description:
Welcome to Crazy Stars! Join adorable and unique characters on an adventure to reach the highest heights. Time your climbs perfectly and aim for the top in this thrilling journey. This casual sports game is easy for everyone to enjoy and lets you experience the world of climbing anytime, anywhere.

・Earn trophies to unlock a variety of characters and accessories to create your unique style.
・Experience the fun of progressing through the game with your own custom character.
・Go for the gold in the Olympic Climbing Speed mode across 10 regions and 100 stages.
・Test your skills and speed to become the ultimate climbing champion.
・Climb each stage quickly and aim for the highest score.
・Challenge your finger dexterity in Infinite Climbing mode.
・This mode will test your stamina and technique as you take your climbing skills to new heights.
・Aim for the highest peaks in 10 regions and reach god-like levels.
・Enjoy climbing matches with 2-4 players in Climbing Match mode.
・Go for the highest scores in 10 regions and test your climbing skills.
・Play with friends and family to share the fun of climbing.

Are you ready for an epic climbing adventure in Crazy Stars? Have fun with friends and family as you scale walls, reach for the top, and push your limits. And remember, the ultimate goal is an Olympic gold medal! Your adventure begins now!
name: Crazy Stars: Sport Climbing
